text.div:
COVID19 Suspected Infection (ICD10)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    Code Display
    B34.2 Coronavirus infection, unspecified
    B97.21 SARS-associated coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
    B97.29 Other coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
    J12.81 Pneumonia due to SARS-associated coronavirus

concept.display: SARS-associated coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
Other coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
